text: SPR Wisła Płock SA, competing for sponsorship reasons as Orlen Wisła Płock, is a professional men's handball team based in Płock in central Poland, founded in 1964. The club plays in the Polish Superliga. Seven–time Polish Champion and ten–time Polish Cup winner. ==Honours== * Polish Superliga :Winners (7): 1994–95, 2001–02, 2003–04, 2004–05, 2005–06, 2007–08, 2010–11 * Polish Cup :Winners (10): 1991–92, 1994–95, 1995–96, 1996–97, 1997–98, 1998–99, 2000–01, 2004–05, 2006–07, 2007–08 ==Former names== *Wisła Płock – (1964–1992) *Petrochemia Płock – (1992–1999) *Petro Płock – (1999–2000) *Orlen
